pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:0.6_0: Ime kho panāyyāyo tiṁsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā uddesaṁ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo bahū patte sannicayaṁ karonti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.3_0: Manussā vihāracārikaṁ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo bahū patte sannicayaṁ karissanti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.5_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.6_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.14.1_0: “Yā pana bhikkhunī pattasannicayaṁ kareyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.7_0: Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā— ukkaṭṭho patto, majjhimo patto, omako patto.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.9_0: aḍḍhāḷhakodanaṁ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṁ khādanaṁ tadupiyaṁ byañjanaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.11_0: nāḷikodanaṁ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṁ khādanaṁ tadupiyaṁ byañjanaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.13_0: patthodanaṁ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṁ khādanaṁ tadupiyaṁ byañjanaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.19_0: Nissajjitabbo saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.21_0: Tāya bhikkhuniyā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.27_0: Ayaṁ patto itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā nissaggiyo saṅghassa nissaṭṭho.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.28_1: saṅgho imaṁ pattaṁ itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā dadeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.29_0: Tāya bhikkhuniyā sambahulā bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.30_1: patto rattātikkanto nissaggiyo, imāhaṁ ayyānaṁ nissajjāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.35_0: Ayaṁ patto itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā nissaggiyo ayyānaṁ nissaṭṭho.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.37_0: Tāya bhikkhuniyā ekaṁ bhikkhuniṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.2.11_0: Nissaggiyaṁ pattaṁ anissajjitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.3.2_0: antoaruṇe adhiṭṭheti, vikappeti, vissajjeti, nassati, vinassati, bhijjati, acchinditvā gaṇhanti, vissāsaṁ gaṇhanti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo nissaṭṭhapattaṁ na denti.
